title: Swarna Vaajralu Gaajulu - Modern Diamond Bangles in Gold
materials: 22K Gold (Swarna) with Brilliant Cut Diamonds (Vaajralu). Features the signature Hyderabadi Gold Polish for a lasting luster. The diamonds are VS clarity
features: These sleek bangles feature a modern S-curve design, elegantly set with three dazzling diamonds on each bangle. The open setting allows maximum light to illuminate the diamonds, enhancing their sparkle. The design blends traditional Gaajulu form with a contemporary minimalist aesthetic.
colors: Classic Gold (Bangaram) with sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions like Diwali
or parties. Their understated elegance makes them suitable for modern celebrations and traditional family gatherings.
description: These bangles offer a modern twist on a classic South Indian jewelry staple. The combination of high-quality gold and sparkling diamonds creates a timeless piece that can be treasured for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures durability and a lasting shine, while the contemporary design makes it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. They represent a perfect blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern style, making them a truly unique and desirable piece.
